title: Ticket #6915: Propagate batch system signals to blahp payload jobs
description:
Greetings!

In the OSG we made a fix to the BLAH[p] to propagate batch system signals to payload jobs, so that the payload would have a chance to clean up.

We'd like to offer this fix for condor's blahp also.

https://patch-diff.githubusercontent.com/raw/opensciencegrid/BLAH/pull/74.patch

If this does not apply for condor's blahp (which looks to have a slew of patches as it stands), i can assist with modifying the patch.

See also: https://opensciencegrid.atlassian.net/browse/SOFTWARE-3554

- Carl

This gives the job a chance to shut down before the scheduler follows up with a SIGKILL and reduces the chance of a stranded job process. (By Jaime Frey )
